div0.head: Tei2html Test Document
div0.p: This is a test document, mainly intended to testTest of a footnote at the div0 level. the features implemented in the tei2html XSLT stylesheets. This document serves the dual purpose of helping me to develop new features, and act as a cheat-sheet to look up how certain things are achieved with my stylesheet (yes, I sometimes forget myself).
